title: Cosmic Queries: Viruses, Outbreaks and Pandemics
description: Infectious disease expert Laurie Garrett is back with Neil deGrasse Tyson to answer your questions about deadly viruses and current epidemics like H7N9 influenza and MERS-CoV.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
